word:
You Cannot Save Yourselves 

     Now you may cling to your righteousness, and you may think that you have tried to do about right, and that, after all, 
                                                                           73
you will be saved in doing this. You cannot see that Christ does it all. "I must repent first," some say. "I must go so far on my own without Christ, and then Christ meets me and accepts me."
